title: Gallows Iron
description: A dark fantasy by B J Mears. The balance of the world is shifting. Once an infrequent and disbelieved phenomenon, ghosts are now a fact of life and dark forces are using them. When MI6 agents get a lead on one of the ghostly gloves, Chapman wants his ghost-haunting spy on the case. Tyler, Melissa and Lucy are sent on a deadly mission and discover a secret that could make or break the alliesâ€™ chances of victory.
author: B.J. Mears
